title: Sevilla Condominiums
posting_body: ['Located minutes from Carrolltons Historic Downtown.', 'Still holding on to its old world charm, Carrollton has been expanding with many new restaurants and shops making this a premiere location for the Dallas-Fort Worth area.', 'Tie that into the easy access to major highways such as the President George Bush Tollway, 35E, and 635; Sevilla is the perfect location to call home', 'Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., TX - License # 9003183', '-Disposal', '-W/D Hookup', '-Refrigerator', '-Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Cable Ready', '-Air Conditioning', '-Air Conditioner', '-Pool', '-Extra Storage', '-Close to Restaurants', '-Clubhouse', '-Laundry Facilities', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
